author: andschwa
body: This pulls in the latest changes from Source Depot, with conflicts resolved. Note that the assembly load context is resolved in favor of Jan's changes until Nano PowerShell has a full solution to the removal of the related APIs. To merge things more easily (due to the mapping between source control systems), the name of the file was reverted. - [x] Add SD tag - [x] Update source-depot branch --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1061)

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: I sign off. Andy and I went through the conflicts together.

title: Merge changes from [SD:709766]
